response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Our product is valued at $1,200,000 to us due to its unique features, advanced technology, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This offer represents an exceptional value, considering the product's true worth and the benefits it can bring to your organization. I understand that your budget might be a consideration, so I am also open to discussing flexible payment options or exploring how we might tailor the package to better fit your specific needs.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product or the terms. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your business growth.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
